Some weeks before this period I had procured a
sledge and go dogs and thus traversed the snows with
inconceivable speed. I know not whether the fiend
possessed the same advantages but I found that as
before I had daily lost ground in the pursuit I now
gained on him; so much so that when I first saw
the ocean he was but one days joury journey in
advance and I hoped to intercept him before
he should reach the beach. With new courage there
fore I pressed on and in two days arrived at a
